_header: With sorrowful sighs and wounds smart
Note:
Cf. 6746. See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 2010.

BLAdd17492.First Lines:
Wyth sorowful syghes and wondes smartmy hart ys persed
                    sodaynly…
BLAdd17492.Last Lines:
…and pray to god to ease owre smartand shortly togyther that
                    we may goo
BLAdd17492.Editions:
Muir,  Kenneth. 
             “Unpublished Poems in the Devonshire MS.” 
             Proc. Leeds Philosophical and Literary Society
         6 (1944-52): 253-82: 262.
